title: Flair Marketing Intelligence (FlairMI)
text:
Welcome. This site hosts short, practical material on marketing analytics with R.
Purpose Help readers run sound analyses with small, named datasets, clear variables, and short R code.
Sections - Survey: schema and sampling tools - Stats: quick statistical calculators and guides - Writer: report templates - Blog: posts that explain methods and link to tools
Style Simple language. Traditional grammar. INR and SI units in public pages.
